description:
Located in Nashville, Tennessee, the lawyers at Bailey & Greer PLLC represent those hurt in accidents throughout the area. We understand just how much an accident can disrupt a person's life and how unfair it can feel, especially when someone else's negligence was the root cause of the accident. 

At our law firm, our attorneys stand up for the rights of those hurt in accidents. We are personal injury lawyers who are deeply committed and passionate about helping others recover, emotionally, physically and financially. Whether someone was involved in a car accident, or was hurt as the result of doctor error, we fight hard to hold those responsible accountable for the injuries their actions caused. No case is too complex for us. Our lawyers will stand up for you. Whether it is against a distracted driver or a tired nurse, know that we are on your side. 

We focus on personal injury and wrongful death cases related to motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, premises liability, workers' compensation, defective drugs and medical devices. 

There are multiple personal injury lawyers at Bailey & Greer PLLC. However, we are still a small law firm and pride ourselves on the personal attention our clients receive. When retaining our services, all clients have one point of contact, from beginning to end. This ensures all clients know of all developments and options along the way.
